amendment.description: Amendment requires the Small Business Administrator to establish and carry out a "Microenterprise Training Center Program" for the purpose of providing low-income and unemployed individuals with training and counseling with respect to starting a microenterprise.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-121 to require the Small Business Administrator to establish and carry out a `Microenterprise Training Center Program' for the purpose of providing low-income and unemployed individuals with training and counseling with respect to starting a microenterprise.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Himes.
